name: psycopg2-binary
description: psycopg2-binary is a database adapter for Python that allows you to connect to PostgreSQL databases
readme:
- PostgreSQL: Use the get_db function to connect to your database and retrieve the connection when you need it
	Make sure to replace the host, database, user, and password with your own values
	You can use the connection object to execute SQL queries and interact with your database
	For more information, refer to the official documentation at https://pypi.org/project/psycopg2-binary/
